short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Classic Cartoons to Your Browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of timeless animation with the Looney Tunes Cursor extension! Whether you grew up watching Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, or Tweety Bird, this extension lets you celebrate your favorite characters in a fun and interactive way. Transform your browsing experience by replacing your default cursor with designs inspired by the iconic Looney Tunes universe.

Iconic Character Cursors: Choose from a variety of custom cursors featuring beloved characters like Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, and more. Relive the charm of these classic cartoons every time you navigate the web.

Easy Installation: Setting up the Looney Tunes Cursor extension is quick and effortless. In just a few clicks, you can replace your plain browser cursor with playful and colorful designs.

Lightweight and Smooth: This extension is optimized for performance, ensuring it runs seamlessly in the background without slowing down your browser or affecting its functionality.

Perfect for Fans: Celebrate your love for Looney Tunes by bringing their playful energy to your online activities. Whether youâ€™re a lifelong fan or a newcomer to their antics, this extension adds a nostalgic touch to your browser.

Customizable Options: With a variety of cursors to choose from, you can easily switch between designs to suit your mood or highlight your favorite character.
